dcterms:creator: M. Garg
C. Saxena
V. Krishnan
R. Joshi
S. Saha
V. Mago
B.J. Dorr
dcterms:description: CAMS dataset consists of 5051 instances (1896 from SDCNL dataset and 3155 Reddit posts) to categorize the direct causes of mental disorders through mentions by users in their posts. Annotation is carried out manually by annotators who are proficient in the language.
dcterms:title: CAMS dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Garg
C. Saxena
V. Krishnan
R. Joshi
S. Saha
V. Mago
B.J. Dorr
dcterms:description: SDCNL dataset is referenced in the context of the CAMS dataset, contributing to the overall analysis of mental health issues in social media posts.
dcterms:title: SDCNL dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Son
N. Bayas
H.A. Schwartz
dcterms:description: CEA dataset is used for causal explanation analysis on social media, focusing on the extraction of causal explanations from text.
dcterms:title: CEA dataset
